review: He keeps you waiting ..... for hours without saying sorry. Avoid at all costs. A care giver should be caring for his patients which he is not
He is very down to earth. Excellent listening skills. Care for patients. Most important he is very polite..
I had consulted the doctor and it was for health concern. Consultation went well. I would like to recommend the doctor to many people.

My aunt had met the doctor and it was for back pain. ****** *** **** ** ********** **. I can surely recommend doctor to my family or friends circle. I am satisfied with the explanation and treatment given. Painkillers were recommended by the doctor. There was no waiting time when we went. Doctor told to take rest and he was friendly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
